name: Khairallah Enterprises (Dynamic Recruit)
overview:
Dynamic Recruit is a recruitment and HR consultancy headquartered in Beirut, Lebanon and serving the MENA region.

Our excellent level of service is what defines our company. We understand that time is very valuable to you, so we have a strict policy to respond to any client request within 48 hours. Our processes are efficiently designed to meet your needs while maintaining the highest level of quality service.

We serve clients from all industries and are able to reach candidates from all around the globe.

Dynamic Recruit offers one-to-one personalized service to all of its clients; employers and job seekers. Our recruitment and consulting services are tailor-made to your specific needs and our quality is guaranteed.
